element.name: Dreadstrike
element.prerequisite: Chill Touch or Toll the Dead cantrip

description.p: Prerequisite: Chill Touch or Toll the Dead cantrip

Whenever you reduce a humanoid to 0 Hit Points and kill them with the chill touch or toll the dead cantrip, you can use your reaction to animate it, causing it to stand up immediately with 1 hit point. The creature uses the zombie stat block in the Monster Manual. It remains animate for 1 hour, after which time it collapses and dies.
In combat, the zombie’s turn comes immediately after yours. It obeys your mental commands, and the only action it can take is the Attack action, making one melee attack.
You can use this feature once, and regain the ability to do so again whenever you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: Whenever you reduce a humanoid to 0 Hit Points and kill them with the chill touch or toll the dead cantrip, you can use your reaction to animate it, causing it to stand up immediately with 1 hit point.

description.p: Prerequisite: Frostbite cantrip
When you cast frostbite, you can target an object or item within range and affect it with one of the following effects:
You can freeze a source of fire, unlighting it.
You can freeze a source of water, up to a 5 foot cube.
You can cover an area with frost, possibly weakening it.
Additionally, creatures cannot benefit from partial or half cover when you cast this spell.
